text:
I chose to talk about social media. For the past ten years this invention had changed the way that people communicate and had a huge impact on information and communication sciences. This invention represents a new media but also the development of the phone and computer technologies which are called medium and in this study it means support that allows the transmitting of information. The search on this media only started to be taught in the past 5 years because it's changed much of the basic knowledge in information and communication. For the first time, the media and informations which are transmitted are not led by professionals, and it means that there are more ways of transmitting, using and appreciating the information, and these ways are certainly more influence factors that the professionals uses. So it was a new medium but also a new form and way of communication. Another interesting point is that social medias are also an invention, a media, which is in constant evolution so the research on it is more interesting.
 This invention is often call a revolution and i think that is true. But, most part of time we show the bad influence of this new medias, and yes they exist, but the old medias had also bad sides. In the past many medias were used to propagation or also were stick for professional or a high social class. So i think that this new media is not better or whorth that  another.
